name: 8 Spice Veggie Stir fry - 1 Pot Vegetable Masala Subzi
description: 8 Spice Veggie Stir fry - Vegetable Masala Subzi. Use up the veggies to make this dry Veggie Stir fry with Indian Spices. Serve with Dal or Curries or make a wrap with a dressing of choice. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp fenugreek seeds powder (powder the fenugreek seeds and use)
1/2 tsp black pepper (1/3 tsp for less heat)
1/2 tsp each ground cumin (,coriander, turmeric, mustard)
1/3 to 1/2 tsp cayenne (or use some paprika and some cayenne)
3 cups of chopped veggies such as cauliflower (carrots, green beans, peppers, zucchini, potatoes, cabbage etc)
3/4 tsp salt (less or more to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the spices and bowl and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the spices and bowl and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until golden. Add the spice mix and cook for 30 seconds.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until golden. Add the spice mix and cook for 30 seconds.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the veggies except peas, salt and toss well to coat. Add a splash of water. Cover and cook for 12 minutes..
recipeInstructions.name: Add the veggies except peas, salt and toss well to coat. Add a splash of water. Cover and cook for 12 minutes..

recipeInstructions.text: Toss well, add peas and mix in. Taste and adjust salt and heat. Cover and cook for another 5 minutes or until the veggies are tender to preference
recipeInstructions.name: Toss well, add peas and mix in. Taste and adjust salt and heat. Cover and cook for another 5 minutes or until the veggies are tender to preference

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro and lemon. Serve with dal and rice/flatbread or make Wraps with hummus or  lentil hummus and cooling dressing such as vegan ranch.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with cilantro and lemon. Serve with dal and rice/flatbread or make Wraps with hummus or  lentil hummus and cooling dressing such as vegan ranch.
